originalTitle: Bobi Wine tells the BBC from hiding he will not contest Uganda election results in court
title: Bobi Wine tells the BBC from hiding he will not contest Uganda election results in court
content: The losing presidential candidate calls for "peaceful change", saying Uganda's judiciary is not independent.

originalTitle: Anthony Joshua's driver appears in court after crash that killed two
title: Anthony Joshua's driver appears in court after crash that killed two
content: The former heavyweight champion was a passenger in the crash, which killed two of his team members.

originalTitle: Nigeria's renowned master wood carver and the Yoruba fertility goddess
title: Nigeria's renowned master wood carver and the Yoruba fertility goddess
content: Kasali Akangbe Ogun, who came from a long line of wood carvers and wanted to preserve local traditions, has been buried following his death after a brief illness.

originalTitle: How the Syrian army pushed Kurdish-led forces out of oil-rich territory
title: How the Syrian army pushed Kurdish-led forces out of oil-rich territory
content: In a lightning-fast offensive, the Syrian government has taken oil-rich territory long held by the Kurdish-led SDF.

originalTitle: Bobi Wine tells Al Jazeera he escaped police raid amid Uganda elections
title: Bobi Wine tells Al Jazeera he escaped police raid amid Uganda elections
content: Uganda’s opposition leader Bobi Wine says he escaped a raid on his home after a disputed presidential election.

title: Who hacked Iranian state TV?
content: Iranian state TV has been hacked, to show messages from the exiled son of the late Shah.

originalTitle: Trump says he will '100%' carry out Greenland tariffs threat, as EU vows to protect its interests
title: Trump says he will '100%' carry out Greenland tariffs threat, as EU vows to protect its interests
content: Kaja Kallas, the EU's foreign policy chief, said the bloc has "no interest to pick a fight, but we will hold our ground".

originalTitle: Confronted over Greenland, Europe is ditching its softly-softly approach to Trump
title: Confronted over Greenland, Europe is ditching its softly-softly approach to Trump
content: Transatlantic relations aren't broken, though they are damaged. And if Europeans want to try to cut through with Trump, they'll have to stick together, writes Europe Editor Katya Adler

originalTitle: Ros Atkins on...President Trump's year in numbers
title: Ros Atkins on...President Trump's year in numbers
content: Executive orders, pardons, trips and Truth Social posts - the BBC’s Analysis Editor breaks down Donald Trump’s first year back in office, in numbers.

originalTitle: Why Iraola's Bournemouth future is uncertain
title: Why Iraola's Bournemouth future is uncertain
content: With his contract expiring in the summer, Andoni Iraola's future at Bournemouth is unclear after two successful seasons in charge.

title: Bournemouth sign midfielder Toth for £10.4m
content: Bournemouth sign Hungary international Alex Toth for £10.4m from Ferencvaros, with the midfielder joining the Cherries on a five-and-half-year contract.

originalTitle: Huddersfield appoint Manning as head coach
title: Huddersfield appoint Manning as head coach
content: League One Huddersfield Town appoint former Norwich and Bristol City boss Liam Manning as head coach.
